INSTALLATION.INVALID: We are sorry but we could not proceed since installation is invalid
INSTALLATION.QLIK_LICENSE: check Qlik License is valid and have access rights
INSTALLATION.CONTENT_LIB: check content library senseexcel exists and have access rights

ERRORS.MISSMATCH_SERIALS: missmatch Sense Excel Reporting Serial and Qlik Serial.
ERRORS.NOT_ENOUGH_SER_TOKENS: Sense Excel Tokens has to been greater or equal Qlik Tokens
ERRORS.CONTENTLIB_NOT_EXISTS: Content Library senseexcel does not exists
ERRORS.LICENSE_BROKEN: License is broken or could not handled in smc
ERRORS.TO_MANY_USERS_AT_SAME_DATE: To many users activated for license at same date
ERRORS.LICENSE_NO_LIMIT: License type expects a limit, none given
ERRORS.INVALID_LICENSE: The License you have been entered, seems not to be a SER License.

WARNINGS.UNKNOWN_LICENSE: Unknown License found and could not validated correctly by SMC
WARNINGS.EMPTY_LICENSE: No License data was found! Insert a valid license or fetch your license from server

MODAL.TITLE: Edit License
MODAL.ERROR_RESPONSE_MESSAGE:
License could not loaded with following Reason: {{ERROR}}
For more Informations please contact your sense excel reporting consultant
